tldr: Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to cross-site scripting (XSS) attacks due to improper sanitization and escaping of group and locale inputs. An attacker could exploit this vulnerability by injecting malicious scripts through a manipulated group or locale parameter, for example, setting `group=<script>alert('xss')</script>`. It would execute when the translation management interface is rendered, potentially compromising user data or session integrity.
doest_this_affect_me: You are affected if you are using a version that falls within the vulnerable range.
how_to_fix: Upgrade the `barryvdh/laravel-translation-manager` library to the patch version.
